name: Kakinfotech Pvt. LTD
overview:
KIPL is a leading provider of Information Technology which includes website development, Internet marketing services and consulting services dedicated to small to medium-sized enterprises. KIPLoffers unmatched quality and fast turnaround time.

KIPL is a professional website design and web development company with offices in New Delhi with large client base in India and across the Globe. Our recognition as a reputed web design company is rooted in our forte i.e. web designing, web development, custom web design, ecommerce web design, flash web design, web hosting and internet marketing solutions.

KIPL specializes in high quality Web Designing, Website Maintenance, Web Application development, Ecommerce Website, Multimedia presentation - 2D/3D animation, Web Hosting, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) or Web Promotion, Logo Designing and custom web solutions for all types of industries. We have good expertise in the areas mentioned above and focus on delivering websites in time with best quality and with minimum cost to our Clients.
